First $a$ is chosen at random from the set $\{1,2,3,\ldots,99,100 \}$, and then $b$ is chosen at random from the same set. The probability that the integer $3^a+7^b$ has units digit $8$ is\\
\\
$\text{(A)} \ \frac1{16} \qquad \text{(B)} \ \frac18 \qquad \text{(C)} \ \frac{3}{16}\qquad \text{(D)} \ \frac15 \qquad \text{(E)} \ \frac14$
